title: How to Put Music on a 3DS

steps.title: Slide the 3DS SD card into your computer.
steps.content: Slide the 3DS SD card into your computer.

steps.title: Right click and create a new folder named "music."
steps.content: Right click and create a new folder named "music."

steps.title: Open the folder.
steps.content: Open the folder. Input all of the music you'd like to listen to on the 3DS. Be mindful of space limitations.

steps.title: Slide the SD card back in your 3DS.
steps.content: Slide the SD card back in your 3DS. Open sound and begin playing the music.
